about_the_game:
The Echo brothers, two retired cybernetic clone troopers, enjoy their well-deserved retirement and the company of Meghan, their adorable enginurse, with whom they reminisce about their crazy past adventures. But little do the old cyborgs suspect that their days of action are not over yet…

Meghan seems to be suspiciously interested in these core memories. We soon find out that the enginurse is forcing the Echo brothers to remember their past exploits to unlock one by one the pieces of a great puzzle that takes shape as the game progresses.



Echo Wars is a shooter that can optionally be played in cooperative multiplayer, where players take on the role of the Echo brothers and relive their adventures aboard a futuristic combat buggy.

Echo Wars is designed to take full advantage of what Virtual Reality has to offer. But it can also be played on traditional screens, ultra-panoramic screens and also has a fantastic adaptation for Steam Deck.

Each level begins with the evocation of a past mission narrated by the Echo brothers, whose tendency to exaggerate and brag about their feats allows the player to choose how specific phrases of the interactive script end, with surprising and hilarious results.

The narrative leads to first-person action levels, where we will be driving with one hand while shooting with the other in breathtaking gameplay, suitable for all players, thanks to the three difficulty levels we can choose.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Drive with one hand while shooting with the other, making your way through the memory lane of the Echo Brothers, two old cyber soldiers whose wacky and hectic memories you'll relive thanks to the magic of VR, in an adventure that can also be played in cooperative mode.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
